message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you! I believe it's a great opportunity for you to acquire this valuable asset. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1,200,000.
Thanks Alice, that's a good starting point.  I'm very interested in the product, but I'm only able to go as high as $1,000,000 at this time.  Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. After considering your offer, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm now willing to sell the product to you for $1,100,000. This is a fair price considering the value the product brings to you.
